Himalaya Public School

Himalaya Public School

Our Academic Programs

At Himalaya Public School, we offer a comprehensive and balanced curriculum designed to foster intellectual growth, critical thinking, and a lifelong love for learning. Our programs cater to students at every stage of their educational journey.

Primary School (Grades 1-5)
Foundational Learning & Exploration

Our primary program focuses on building a strong foundation in literacy, numeracy, and scientific inquiry. We encourage curiosity and a love for learning through interactive activities and a supportive environment.

Key Subjects:

English
Mathematics
Environmental Science (EVS)
Hindi
Art & Craft
Physical Education
Middle School (Grades 6-8)
Developing Skills & Understanding

In middle school, students delve deeper into core subjects, develop critical thinking skills, and begin to explore their interests. The curriculum is designed to be engaging and challenging, preparing them for higher studies.

Key Subjects:

English
Mathematics
Science (Physics, Chemistry, Biology)
Social Studies (History, Geography, Civics)
Hindi/Sanskrit
Computer Science
High School (Grades 9-10)
Board Examination Preparation & Specialization

The high school program is geared towards preparing students for board examinations (CBSE). We offer a rigorous academic schedule combined with co-curricular activities for holistic development.

Key Subjects:

English
Mathematics
Science (Physics, Chemistry, Biology)
Social Science (History, Geography, Civics, Economics)
Second Language
Information Technology
Senior Secondary (Grades 11-12)
Advanced Studies & Career Focus

Students in senior secondary choose specialized streams (Science, Commerce, Arts/Humanities) to focus on subjects aligned with their career aspirations. We provide expert guidance and resources for competitive exams and university admissions.

Key Subjects:

Stream-specific subjects (e.g., Physics, Chemistry, Maths/Biology, Accountancy, Economics, History, Political Science)
English Core
Optional Subjects
